movies.title: La 7ème compagnie au clair de lune
movies.plot: Les 3 compères de la 7ème compagnie poursuivent leurs mésaventures. Cette fois-ci, ils tombent par inadvertance sur des résistants au cours d'une chasse et sont enrôlés bien malgré eux dans la résistance. Tout ceci finira par le débarquement allié en Normandie.
movies.simplePlot: Les 3 compères de la 7ème compagnie poursuivent leurs mésaventures. Cette fois-ci, ils tombent par inadvertance sur des résistants au cours d'une chasse et sont enrôlés bien malgré eux dans...

biography.bio: Jean Lefebvre was born on October 3, 1919 in Valenciennes, Nord, France as Jean Marcel Lefebvre. He was an actor, known for Diabolique (1955), Le gendarme se marie (1968) and The Troops on Vacation (1970). He was married to Brigitte Lerebours, Yori Bertin and Micheline Grasser. He died on July 9, 2004 in Marrakech, Morocco.
biography.name: Jean Lefebvre

biography.bio: Pierre Mondy was born on February 10, 1925 in Neuilly-sur-Seine, Seine [now Hauts-de-Seine], France as Pierre Cuq. He is known for his work on Les Cordier, juge et flic (1992), Astérix et la surprise de César (1985) and Astérix chez les Bretons (1986). He was married to Catherine Allary, Anne Fournier, Pascale Roberts and Claude Gensac. He died on September 15, 2012 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Pierre Mondy

biography.bio: Henri Guybet was born on December 21, 1936 in Paris, France. He is an actor, known for The Mad Adventures of 'Rabbi' Jacob (1973), The Pawn (1978) and On a retrouvé la 7ème Compagnie! (1975).
biography.name: Henri Guybet

biography.bio: Patricia Karim was born on February 3, 1935 in Spa, Belgium as Paule Jehan. She is an actress, known for La 7ème compagnie au clair de lune (1977), Le petit frère d'Huguette (1997) and Ubu cocu ou l'archéoptéryx (1981).
biography.name: Patricia Karim

biography.bio: Gérard Hérold was born on September 10, 1939 in Mulhouse, Haut-Rhin, France. He was an actor, known for Mon Pere Ce Heros (1991), Ciao, les mecs (1979) and La 7ème compagnie au clair de lune (1977). He died on August 19, 1993 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Gérard Hérold

biography.bio: Gérard Jugnot was born on May 4, 1951 in Paris, France. He is an actor and writer, known for The Chorus (2004), Faubourg 36 (2008) and Une époque formidable... (1991).
biography.name: Gérard Jugnot

biography.bio: Jean Carmet was born on April 25, 1920 in Bourgueil, Indre-et-Loire, France as Jean Gabriel Edmond Carmet. He was an actor and writer, known for Germinal (1993), Buffet froid (1979) and Black and White in Color (1976). He died on April 20, 1994 in Sèvres, Hauts-de-Seine, France.
biography.name: Jean Carmet

biography.bio: André Pousse was born on October 20, 1919 in Paris, France. He was an actor, known for Un Flic (1972), The Sicilian Clan (1969) and Le pacha (1968). He died on September 9, 2005 in La Garde-Freinet, Var, France.
biography.name: André Pousse

biography.bio: Michel Berto was born on December 25, 1939 in Grenoble, Isère, France as Michel Hugues Ernest Noël Bertoliatti. He was an actor, known for Beau Pere (1981), Carne (1991) and The Fugitives (1986). He was married to Marie Berto and Juliet Berto. He died on December 25, 1995 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Michel Berto

biography.bio: Konrad von Bork is an actor, known for La 7ème compagnie au clair de lune (1977), Mado (1976) and Mais où est donc passée la 7ème compagnie (1973).
biography.name: Konrad von Bork

biography.bio: Rachel Cathoud is known for her work on La fin de la nuit (1966), Les mensonges (1971) and Le mouton enragé (1974).
biography.name: Rachel Cathoud

biography.bio: Alain Chevallier was born on September 12, 1940 in Geneva, Switzerland. He was an actor, known for Pont dormant (1972), Alice où es-tu? (1969) and La 7ème compagnie au clair de lune (1977). He died on October 9, 1999 in Courbevoie, Hauts-de-Seine, France.
biography.name: Alain Chevallier

biography.bio: Jean-François Dérec was born on May 11, 1957 in France as Jean-François Dereczynski. He is an actor and writer, known for The Grand Highway (1987), Marche à l'ombre (1984) and Extrême Pinocchio (2014).
biography.name: Jean-François Dérec

biography.bio: Herbert Fiala is an actor, known for La 7ème compagnie au clair de lune (1977), Le sud (1982) and On a retrouvé la 7ème Compagnie! (1975).
biography.name: Herbert Fiala

biography.bio: François Germain is an actor, known for Hunter Will Get You (1976), La 7ème compagnie au clair de lune (1977) and Coup de tête (1979).
biography.name: François Germain
